item.description:
We will meet at the Nineteen Mile Brook Trailhead (The trailhead is on the east side of Route 16, 1 mile north of the Mt. Washington Auto Road). The sign is easy to miss if you've never been at this trailhead before.
We will hike 1.9 miles on Nineteen Brook Trail(an almost flat trail) along a beautiful brook. Left on Carter Dome Trail, hiking 1.9 miles to the next intersection. Left on Carter Moriah Trail .8 miles to South Carter, and 1.3 miles to South Carter.
At this point the trails have all been packed down. Snowshoes, crampons, and microspikes or some kind of light traction are strongly recommended. Bring warm clothes for the summits.

Good opportunity for those completing the 4000 footers. Dogs are welcome. We will leave 8:15am sharp.
If anyone has any kind of medical condition. please let the leader know.
item.name: South & Middle Carter
